Desc.entry: Offer classes in traditional Chinese skills of Wild Goose (Dayan) Qigong, Chen Style Tai Chi (Taijiquan), Wing Chun Kung Fu and Northern Shaolin Chun Yuen Quan. Wild Goose Qigong is an 1800 year old discipline which teaches relaxation, gentle movement, breathing and meditation. Chen Style Tai Chi is the oldest form of tai chi and covers both health and martial arts. Wing Chun is a very practical method of self defence and uses sensitivity and skill to overcome strength and so is ideal for women. Northern Shaolin Chun Yuen Quan is a dynamic exercise for improving fitness, flexibility, co-ordination and posture. Its roots are in martial arts and Chinese Opera.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 6.30-7.30pm (Chen Taijiquan), 6.30-7.30pm (Chun Yuen Quan), 7.30-8.30pm (Wild Goose Qigong), 8.30-9.30pm (Wing Chun Kung Fu)

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - TAI CHI, QI GONG AND CAPOEIRA
